Experience.title: Software Engineer
Experience.description:
Implemented error handling, time and memory profiling, and communication between master and worker nodes for distributed compilation. Support on x86 as well as ARM machines.
Fixed and maintained incremental compilation, which reduces compile time for Verilog designs on a module level by recognizing modules which do not require recompilation.

Experience.title: Autonomous Driving R&D Intern
Experience.company: Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI)(工業技術研究院, 工研院) Internship
Experience.description:
Directly Responsible Individual for visual-inertial odometry (VIO) module.
Survey recent advances in VIO as well as deploy and test VIO on self-driving cars extensively under diverse road conditions.
Improved VIO failure detection module by incorporating vehicle motion constraints into the original algorithm.
